replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
那是裝了 MoreCreeps & Weirdos MOD, 其中一種奇異生物
http://www.minecraftforum.net/to ... keys-hotdog-revamp/

*** GOO GOAT ***
A rather peaceful animal that munches on grass and fills up with slime. You can see him fill up and grow as he strips the landscape of grass. Killing it will yeild Goo Donuts dependent on his size and slime capacity.

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content: 更多怪物裏的透明狼而已。。 像史萊姆一樣

replies.author: q310119
replies.txt_content: 再问一下 它可以驯服吗？？

replies.author: tgwby04525
replies.txt_content:
q310119 发表于 2011-7-14 12:43 
再问一下 它可以驯服吗？？
不能
但打死她會掉1個綠色手環的東西
可以丟出去會把東西炸掉
